longMSG:
You are in the living room.
There is a sofa and a console table. 
You may go...
    north to the hallway1 through the northern entryway,
    east to the bar lounge through the french door,
    southeast to the garage through the house-to-garage door,
    south to the courtyard through the front door
    west to the dining room through the western entryway
shortMSG:
You are in the living room on the 1st floor. 
Features: sofa, chairs, console table
Areas you may go to:
north - northern entryway to hallway1 - 1st floor
east - french door to bar lounge - 1st floor
southeast - house-to-garage door to garage - 1st floor
south - front door to courtyard - 1st floor
west - western entryway to dining room - 1st floor
